  <meta content="We manufacture quality, handcrafted craft room furniture designed in a modular fashion allowing you the flexibility to custom design your own space or, ask us and we'll gladly do it for you! Everything is handcrafted and built by my husband, Greg, and as his wife, I will be the one to answer all of your questions and it's quite common to see me out in the shop sanding, routing and even packaging boxes up for shipment! We wear many hats here at ScrapNcube but most importantly, you can trust us to always produce the highest quality possible and we'll always stand by our product for your 100% satisfaction!" id="ctl00_MetaDescription" name="Description"/>

        We are committed to providing you with the highest quality craft room furniture possible. It is because of this high standard that we are able to stand behind our product with a lifetime guarantee. In addition to our fine craftsmanship, we also go a step further and pre-install all of the hardware so you don't have to. All of our craft tables, shelving and accessory items are pre-assembled here in the shop to ensure everything is customized and fits together perfectly before it is prepared for shipment. All of our cubes and drawers come fully assembled so all you do is take them out of the box and begin filling them.
